column1: As a name, it referred to [[Ilmarin]], or the [[Dome of Varda]] above [[Valinor]].<ref>{{WJ
It was derived from the [[Quenya]] word ''teluma'' with influence from the [[Valarin]] word ''delgūmā''.<ref>{{WJ

column2: Andúnë pella, Vardo tellumar ('beyond the West, beneath the blue vaults of Varda')
